description: This file provides an API abstraction layer for recipes, supporting both mock data and real API calls. It includes functions to list recipes with filtering and pagination, normalize recipe data, and retrieve individual recipes by ID.

methods.name: normalizeRecipe(r)
methods.description: Normalizes a recipe object to a consistent shape expected by UI components.

methods.name: paginate(list, { page = 1, pageSize = 12 } = {})
methods.description: Applies pagination to a list based on page number and size.

methods.name: listRecipes({ q = '', category = 'All', page = 1, pageSize = 12 } = {})
methods.description: Lists recipes with optional search, category filtering, and pagination, supporting both mock and real API modes.

methods.name: getRecipe(id)
methods.description: Retrieves a single recipe by ID, supporting mock data and real API.

ctags.name: listRecipes
ctags.pattern: /^export async function listRecipes({ q = '', category = 'All', page = 1, pageSize = 12 } = {}) {$/
